name: Southeastern Live Well Center Skylight Art Reflects the Beauty of Water and Community
description: When the Southeastern Live Well Center officially opens its doors later this year, visitors will be treated to an inspiring artistic experience. Thirty-three local artists have their original work on display, for a total of 50 pieces of art throughout the building and on the property.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Visitors to the Southeastern Live Well Center will be treated to an inspiring artistic experience. Thirty-three local artists have their original work on display, for a total of 50 pieces of art throughout the building and on the property. Each artist featured at the County’s newest Live Well Center has roots in the community, and their work is representative of the region’s rich history, culture and diversity. One of those artists is Kaori Fukuyama and her beautiful three-dimensional piece floats suspended above the interior staircase.
Join us for a Southeastern Live Well Center community celebration Saturday, Oct. 14.
